title: Empatica EpiMonitor
description:
EpiMonitor is Empatica's next-generation, FDA-cleared, epilepsy monitoring system aiming to provide peace of mind for people living with epilepsy and their caregivers. The EpiMonitor App pairs with EmbracePlus, a medical smartwatch designed for continuous health monitoring. The App and watch work together to detect possible convulsive seizures. When detection occurs, EpiMonitor will alert the user’s selected caregivers via an automated text message (SMS) and phone call so they may get help when they need it most. EpiMonitor can also serve as a practical seizure diary integrating activity data and sleep data creating an automated epilepsy journal. 

The EpiMonitor App requires a dedicated smartphone with Bluetooth connectivity and is available with a subscription plan. It is only designed to work with the EmbracePlus smartwatch by Empatica and is exclusively available athttps://www.empatica.com/store/epimonitor

++++ SEIZURE ALERTS++++ 
EpiMonitor’s most important feature aims to provide prompt assistance when a possible convulsive seizure is detected. Alerts are sent to dedicated caregivers as phone calls and text messages (SMS) with the GPS location of the user. Alerts may be automatically sent when a possible seizure event is detected or by manually pressing a button on the EmbracePlus smartwatch when you feel you might need help.

++++ SEIZURE TRACKER & DIARY ++++ 
Epimonitor keeps track of all your seizures in a practical digital diary that is available inside the app and can also be downloaded in PDF form, and easily shared with family or physicians. Integrated activity and sleep data collected via the EmbracePlus smartwatch may also be integrated and viewed on the app to monitor fitness or identify trends and patterns in your epilepsy. 

++++ REGULATORY ++++
USA: EpiMonitor is a prescription-only device indicated for use as an adjunct to seizure monitoring of adults in home or healthcare facilities during periods of rest. Always refer to the product Manual for detailed instructions, warnings, precautions, and possible risks related to EpiMonitor. 

EpiMonitor should never be used to make medical or diagnostics decisions. Always seek a doctor's advice before using this app and before making any medical decisions. 

Take full control over your epilepsy management and discover a new-found peace of mind with EpiMonitor.
